title: Combo Makhana Pack of 3 Flavours - Peri Peri, Mint & Pink Salt
name: sattviko-combo-makhana-pack-of-3-flavours-peri-peri-mint-pink-salt
description: Explore a delightful trio with our Makhana Combo Pack featuring Peri Peri, Mint, and Pink Salt flavors. These roasted foxnuts offer a healthy, gluten-free, and protein-rich snack option. Experience the spicy kick of Peri Peri, the refreshing zest of Mint, and the elegant taste of Pink Salt—all in one convenient pack. Perfect for any time snacking and sharing with family and friends!
ingredientsDesc: MINT Makhana (66%), Edible Vegetable Oil (Rice Bran), Edible Common Salt, Maltodextrin, Spices & Condiments (Coriander, Dry Mango, Turmeric Powder, Ginger, Clove, Cinnamon, Mace, Cardamom), Mint Powder, Green Chilli Powder, Flavour Enhancer (INS 621), Hydrolysed Vegetable Protein, Acidity Regulator (INS 330), Anticaking Agent (INS 551), Nature Identical Flavouring Substances PERI PERI Makhana (66%), Edible Vegetable Oil (Rice Bran), Maltodextrin, Edible Common Salt, Sugar, Black Salt, Dehydrated Vegetable Powder (Garlic, Onion), Spices & Condiments (Dry Mango, Coriander, Red Chilli, Carom Seeds, Cumin), Flavour Enhancer (INS 621), Lemon Juice Powder, Acidity Regulator (INS 330), Anticaking Agent (INS 551), Added Natural Colour (INS 160c), Probiotic (Bacillus Coagulans) 500 million CFU per serving, Added Natural Colour (INS 160c), Nature Identical Flavouring Substances PINK SALT Makhana, Olive Oil, Seasonings & Spices (Black Pepper, Pink Salt)

title: Millet Puff Cream & Onion Combo Pack of 3
name: sattviko-millet-puff-cream-onion-combo-pack-of-3
description: Enjoy a healthy snack with our Millet Puff Combo Pack of 3 in Cream and Onion flavor. Made from nutritious millets, these crispy puffs are rich in fiber and essential nutrients. Perfect for any time of the day, they offer a tasty and wholesome alternative for snack lovers.
ingredientsDesc: Jowar (Sorghum) (17%), Corn, Edible Vegetable Oil (Rice Bran), Gram, Rice, Ragi (Finger Millet) (7%), Quinoa, Sugar, Milk Solids, Iodized Salt, Onion Powder, Maltodextrin, Black Pepper, Dehydrated Parsley, Acidity Regulator (INS 330, INS 270), Probiotic (Bacillus Coagulans – 500 million CFU per Serve), Anticaking Agent (INS 551), Natural and Nature Identical Flavouring Substances Added Yogic Herbs: Golden Turmeric, Cardamom, Cinnamon, Black Pepper, Ginger, Clove Holy Basil, Ashwagandha, Lemon, Bay Leaf, Cumin, Beet Root, Licorice

title: Gur Chana Combo - Pack of 3
name: sattviko-roasted-spanish-tomato-cashews
description: Enjoy a traditional and healthy snack with our Gur Chana Combo Pack. This delicious combination of roasted chickpeas coated in jaggery offers a perfect blend of sweet and crunchy. Rich in protein and iron, our gur chana is a nutritious treat ideal for any time of the day. Enjoy the natural sweetness of jaggery paired with the wholesome goodness of chana in every bite.

title: Makhana Combo Pack of 3 - Chocolate Flavour
name: sattviko-chocolate-makhana-pack-of-3
description: Enjoy the rich and crunchy taste of our Chocolate Makhana Pack of 3. These roasted foxnuts are coated with chocolate, offering a healthy, gluten-free, and protein-rich snack. Perfect for any time of the day!
ingredientsDesc: Sugar, Makhana (13%), Liquid Glucose, Milk Solids, Sesame Seeds (3%), Edible Common Salt, Cocoa Solids, Raising Agent (INS 500(ii)), Edible Vegetable Fat (Hydrogenated), Milk Solids, Emulsifiers (INS 492, INS 322(i)), Natural Food Colour (INS 150c), Nature Identical Flavouring Substances

title: Makhana Combo Pack of 3 - Pink Salt Flavour
name: sattviko-pink-salt-makhana-pack-of-3
description: Treat yourself to the savory Pink Salt flavor with our Makhana Combo Pack of 3. Crafted from premium quality lotus seeds, these healthy and crunchy snacks are ideal for any time of the day. Enjoy a guilt-free snacking experience with a delightful taste in every bite.
ingredientsDesc: Makhana, Olive Oil, Seasonings & Spices (Black Pepper, Pink Salt) Added Yogic Herbs: Golden Turmeric, Cardamom, Cinnamon, Black Pepper, Ginger, Clove Holy Basil, Ginseng, Lemon, Bay Leaf, Cumin, Beet Root, Licorice

title: Makhana Combo Pack of 3 - Peri Peri Flavour
name: sattviko-peri-peri-makhana-pack-of-3
description: These deliciously spicy Peri Peri flavor with our Makhana Combo Pack of 3. Made from premium quality lotus seeds, these healthy and crunchy snacks are perfect for any time of the day. Enjoy guilt-free snacking with a burst of flavor in every bite.
ingredientsDesc: Makhana (66%), Edible Vegetable Oil (Rice Bran), Maltodextrin, Edible Common Salt, Sugar, Black Salt, Dehydrated Vegetable Powder (Garlic, Onion), Spices & Condiments (Dry Mango, Coriander, Red Chilli, Carom Seeds, Cumin), Flavour Enhancer (INS 621), Lemon Juice Powder, Acidity Regulator (INS 330), Anticaking Agent (INS 551), Added Natural Colour (INS 160c), Probiotic (Bacillus Coagulans) 500 million CFU per serving, Added Natural Colour (INS 160c), Nature Identical Flavouring Substances.

title: Sattviko Festive Gift Hamper | Healthy Snacks | Pack of 4
name: sattviko-festive-gift-hamper-healthy-snacks-pack-of-4
description: Celebrate with our Healthy Snack Festive Gift Hamper, featuring Gur Chana, Peri Peri Makhana, and flavored cashews and almonds. Packed with nutritious ingredients, this premium gift set offers a delightful mix of taste and health. Perfect for festivals and special occasions, it's the ideal gift for health-conscious snack lovers. Indulge in guilt-free snacking and spread joy with every bite.

title: Instant Upma Combo - Pack of 3
name: sattviko-instant-upma-combo-pack-of-3
description: Savor the convenience of our Instant Upma Combo Pack of 3. These ready-to-cook upma packs are made with wholesome ingredients, offering a quick and nutritious meal option. Perfect for busy mornings or a quick snack, our instant upma provides a delicious and healthy choice for any time of the day. It comes with a spoon and cup for quick and effortless use.
ingredientsDesc: Semolina (Suji) (68%), Edible Vegetable Oil (Rice Bran), Cashew, Ghee, Sugar, Salt, Dehyrdrated Vegetable (Onion, Garlic, Carrot, Peas) (3%), Split Bengal Gram, Split Black Gram, Mustard, Spices & Condiments, Chilli Powder, Curry Leaves, Nature Identical Flavouring Substances

title: Makhana Combo Pack of 3 - Sweet Chilli Flavour
name: sattviko-sweet-chilli-makhana-pack-of-3
description: Experience the spicy and sweet taste of our Sweet Chilli Makhana Combo Pack. These roasted foxnuts are seasoned with sweet chilli, offering a healthy, gluten-free, and protein-rich snack. Perfect for any time of the day!
ingredientsDesc: Makhana, Olive Oil, Seasonings & Spices (Green Chilli, Dried Onion), Fennel, Mace, Nutmeg, Edible Salt, Sugar, Red Chilli, Fenugreek, Paprika) Added Yogic Herbs: Golden Turmeric, Cardamom, Cinnamon, Black Pepper, Ginger, Clove Holy Basil, Ashwagandha, Lemon, Bay Leaf, Cumin, Beet Root, Licorice

title: Makhana Combo Pack of 3 - Caramel Flavour
name: sattviko-instant-upma-combo-pack-of-3
description: Enjoy the crunchy and sweet taste of our Caramel Makhana Pack of 3. These roasted foxnuts are coated with caramel, making them a healthy, gluten-free, and protein-rich snack. Perfect for anytime snacking!
ingredientsDesc: Sugar (59%), Makhana (17%), Liquid Glucose, Milk Solids, Sesame Seeds (4%), Edible Common Salt, Cocoa Powder, Raising Agent (INS 500(ii)), Emulsifier (INS 322(i)), Natural food Colour (INS 150c), Flavour (Artificial Flavouring Substance - Caramel)

title: Makhana Combo Pack of 3 - Mint Flavour
name: sattviko-mint-makhana-pack-of-3
description: Experience the refreshing taste of our Makhana Combo Pack of 3 in Mint Flavor, offering a perfect blend of taste and nutrition. Rich in protein, fiber, and essential minerals, these guilt-free snacks are ideal for mindful eating.
